channel.title: [474] server shutdown help [474]
channel.description:
Hello, i am running a 474 server
Server like 1-2days my server just auto trun off by it self
Anyhow i can fix it or something?

item.title: [474] server shutdown help [474]
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

check your java on the vps make sure your java’s set up right.
And i just rememberd!!! when i had a vps i was having same problems just make sure the firewalls turned off too! keep updating me if it works

Read full topic

Well i am using VPS

item.title: [474] server shutdown help [474]
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

check to see if your default ip has changed which happens to some routers everyday or because you unplugged it. If that doesnt work check you’re java and check if you have your 43594 port open. My guess is it’s the portforwarding. So just go on cmd type “ipconfig” check your default gateway (note when doing ipconfig on cmd, look for default gateway, look for 192.168.1.###) Then re-portforward by just editing your resent one if you allready have and change the last number to the number it is currently

Read full topic
